mapper.select: SELECT s.shop_name, g.img_name, i.shop_idx, i.item_idx, i.item_title, i.item_content, i.item_price, i.item_date, i.item_status, COUNT(w.member_id) as wish, i.item_readCnt , c.category_big, c.category_small, i.item_region, i.item_hide, i.item_quantity FROM item AS i LEFT JOIN wish AS w ON i.item_idx = w.item_idx JOIN category AS c ON i.item_idx = c.item_idx JOIN shop s ON i.shop_idx = s.shop_idx JOIN img g ON g.item_idx = i.item_idx WHERE i.item_idx = #{item_idx}
SELECT ord_date FROM ord WHERE ord_idx=(SELECT MAX(ord_idx) FROM ord WHERE member_id=#{member_id})
SELECT coin_total FROM coin WHERE coin_date = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT max(coin_date) FROM coin WHERE member_id=#{member_id}) AS a)
SELECT coupon_idx, coupon_title, coupon_price FROM coupon WHERE member_id=#{buyer_id} AND #{item_price} * #{ord_quantity} >= coupon_price
SELECT coin_total, max(coin_date) FROM coin WHERE 1=1 AND coin_date = (SELECT MAX(coin_date) FROM coin WHERE member_id=#{buyer_id} )

SELECT it.item_idx, im.img_name, it.item_title, it.item_price, it.item_region , it.item_date FROM item it, recentView re, img im WHERE re.member_id = #{sId} AND it.item_idx IN (re.item_idx) AND it.item_idx = im.item_idx AND im.img_idx = '1' ORDER BY re.viewTime DESC
